ygData.subject: Re: Rodimus (Rodimus-> Maximals, Kenzo, Fortuneteller, Megatron)
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron Revived: Do whatever.  If you need me, I will be outside. the Emperor said as he turned and moved toward the base s entrance. ... like to lose
